name: Steven Anderson
description:
I am very true real, not materialistic, but do enjoy the finer things in life. One of my fundamental beliefs is how we treat one another. I am passionate about respect appreciation for other people. I am easily touched by the simplest of things. I love to laugh and love humor on all levels. I try and enjoy every minute of day. I am giving and forgiving person.
I am looking for someone that knows what they are looking for desire to make a real future with someone special. Someone as a Companion, Friend, Coach, Lover Mentor. Someone who i can gain strength from, just being with them, who’s eye’s i can look into and know that everything will be alright, someone i can trust and turn over my Heart to and will know be able to take care of it. Some one how could be my best friend and some one, how is honest, with a good sense of humor, intelligent and communicative so that we can have very long talks, and how now there is growing a some thing beautiful like love and passion.Mutual respect, love, understanding,compromise..looking for an honest person, loyal, communicative, independent, with clear ideas…
